Sentencas: This work investigates the activity of copper modified Ce0.50Zr0.50O2 (Cu-CZ) based anodes prepared through subsequent impregnation steps into a porous YSZ matrix.
Titulo: Effect of redox treatments on Ce0.50Zr0.50O2 based solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The ceria zirconia oxide was reduced at increasing temperatures and the effect of structural changes on anode performance investigated at 973 K under humidified H-2.
Titulo: Effect of redox treatments on Ce0.50Zr0.50O2 based solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: Performance of all cells increased after one redox cycle due to a decrease of both the anode polarization and the ohmic resistance of the cell.
Titulo: Effect of redox treatments on Ce0.50Zr0.50O2 based solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The redox behaviour of Cu-CZ anode was investigated in a symmetrical cell configuration and it was observed that subsequent redox cycles lead to an activation and stabilization of the electrodes.
Titulo: Effect of redox treatments on Ce0.50Zr0.50O2 based solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: SEM and EIS characterizations showed that this is mainly attributable to a rearrangement of the morphology and microstructure of the CZ oxide at the electrode/electrolyte interface and to an improvement of copper distribution into the porous electrode matrix.
Titulo: Effect of redox treatments on Ce0.50Zr0.50O2 based solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: It is inferred that the interplay of copper and CZ favours the promotion of anode activity by increasing the number of active sites; moreover it stabilizes the redox behaviour of the electrode.
Titulo: Effect of redox treatments on Ce0.50Zr0.50O2 based solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: An optimization of electrical and structural properties of Cu-CZ composites was also discussed.
Titulo: Effect of redox treatments on Ce0.50Zr0.50O2 based solid oxide fuel cell anodes
